name: Energy
desc: Elemental Energy is a resource that allows each character to activate their Elemental Burst after acquiring a specific amount.

customize.name: Layla
customize.desc: A Rtawahist student who specializes in Theoretical Astrology. Heavily prone to somnambulism and locked in a grinding war with sleep deprivation, the problem of restful slumber is a most troubling one to her.

customize.name: Tighnari
customize.desc: A young researcher well-versed in botany who currently serves as a Forest Watcher in Avidya Forest. He is a straight shooter with a warm heart - and a dab hand at guiding even the dullest of pupils.

customize.name: Shikanoin Heizou
customize.desc: A young prodigy detective from the Tenryou Commission. His senses are sharp and his thoughts are clear.

customize.name: Aloy
customize.desc: Formerly an outcast, now a hunter of unparalleled skill. Ready to do the right thing at any time.

customize.name: Albedo
customize.desc: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

customize.name: Zhongli
customize.desc: A mysterious expert contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.

customize.name: Diluc
customize.desc: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

customize.name: Keqing
customize.desc: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis's unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue — but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

customize.name: Ningguang
customize.desc: The Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.

customize.name: Chongyun
customize.desc: A young exorcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his abundance of yang energy.

customize.name: Amber
customize.desc: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

customize.name: Emilie
customize.desc: A Fontainian perfumer, one who bottles secrets.

customize.name: Chiori
customize.desc: The owner of Chioriya Boutique. A tailor renowned throughout Fontaine.

customize.name: Nahida
customize.desc: A caged bird secluded within the confines of the Sanctuary of Surasthana who can only see the world in her dreams.

customize.name: Yumemizuki Mizuki
customize.desc: A shareholder of Aisa Bathhouse, a baku, and a clinical psychologist. Dedicated to the dispersal of nightmares, and to bringing people peace of mind.

customize.name: Lan Yan
customize.desc: A rattan weaver from Chenyu Vale. Clear-minded and well-tempered, she is as lively as a mountain spring.

customize.name: Citlali
customize.desc: The great shaman from the Masters of the Night-Wind, the universally-revered Granny Itztli.

customize.name: Ororon
customize.desc: A young man from the Masters of the Night-Wind who instead lives in the wild alongside all manner of life.

customize.name: Chasca
customize.desc: The Peacemaker of the Tlalocan, the ender of all disputes.

customize.name: Xilonen
customize.desc: A Name Engraver of the Nanatzcayan, she is especially skilled at finding a good balance between the heavy responsibilities of her job and living well.

customize.name: Mualani
customize.desc: A well-known guide in Natlan who owns a watersports shop, and expert in all forms of wave-chasing.

customize.name: Sethos
customize.desc: The Temple of Silence's heir. Burdened with secrets, he comes from the sands.

customize.name: Clorinde
customize.desc: An undefeated Champion Duelist. Sword in hand, she defends justice in the Court of Fontaine.

customize.name: Gaming
customize.desc: Guard of the Sword and Strongbox Secure Transport Agency, and the head of the "Mighty Mythical Beasts" Wushou troupe.

customize.name: Chevreuse
customize.desc: The captain of the Special Security and Surveillance Patrol, who wears justice as an ever-present seal upon her heart. Her musket shall only ever point at the guilty.

customize.name: Navia
customize.desc: The current President of Spina di Rosula, who is lovely, dutiful, and a great boss.

customize.name: Furina
customize.desc: The absolute focus of the stage of judgment, until the final applause sounds.

customize.name: Wriothesley
customize.desc: Duke of the Fortress of Meropide, Lord Incognito of the murky depths.

customize.name: Freminet
customize.desc: A reserved young man who is well-versed in diving. Beneath his distant, icy demeanor lies a pure heart bereft of all flaws.

customize.name: Lyney
customize.desc: A famed Fontainian magician who possesses great stage presence as well as gift of the gab. Audiences are enthralled by his exquisite skills, and they hang on to his every clever word.

customize.name: Kirara
customize.desc: A courier for Komaniya Express, a delivery company in Inazuma. A nekomata who loves her job and human society.

customize.name: Wanderer
customize.desc: A wayfaring figure whose identity is a mystery. He dresses like a mountain ascetic, but he certainly does not act the part.

customize.name: Candace
customize.desc: A descendant of King Deshret with an amber left eye. The defender of Aaru Village.

customize.name: Collei
customize.desc: A trainee ranger active in Avidya Forest. Behind her enthusiastic words and actions hides a slightly introverted personality.

customize.name: Kuki Shinobu
customize.desc: The capable and reliable deputy leader of the "Arataki Gang." Please note: capable and reliable are not appellations for the "Arataki Gang," but for their deputy leader in specific.

customize.name: Yun Jin
customize.desc: A renowned Liyue opera singer who is skilled in both playwriting and singing. Her style is one-of-a-kind, exquisite and delicate, much like the person herself.

customize.name: Yoimiya
customize.desc: Owner of Naganohara Fireworks. Known as "Queen of the Summer Festival," she excels in her craft of creating fireworks that symbolize people's hopes and dreams.

customize.name: Kaedehara Kazuha
customize.desc: A wandering samurai from Inazuma who is currently with Liyue's Crux Fleet. A gentle and carefree soul whose heart hides a great many burdens from the past.

customize.name: Rosaria
customize.desc: A sister of the church, though you wouldn't know it if it weren't for her attire. Known for her sharp, cold words and manner, she often works alone.

customize.name: Hu Tao
customize.desc: The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. She took over the business at a rather young age.

customize.name: Ganyu
customize.desc: The secretary at Yuehai Pavilion. The blood of the qilin, an illuminated beast, flows within her veins.

customize.name: Xinyan
customize.desc: Liyue's sole rock 'n' roll musician. She rebels against ossified prejudices using her music and passionate singing.

customize.name: Tartaglia
customize.desc: No. 11 of The Harbingers, also known as "Childe." His name is highly feared on the battlefield.

customize.name: Klee
customize.desc: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius's confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

customize.name: Venti
customize.desc: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.

customize.name: Mona
customize.desc: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.

customize.name: Traveler (Anemo)
customize.desc: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

customize.name: Traveler (Geo)
customize.desc: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

customize.name: Noelle
customize.desc: A maid who faithfully serves the Knights of Favonius. She dreams of joining their ranks someday.

customize.name: Bennett
customize.desc: A good-natured adventurer from Mondstadt who's unfortunately extremely unlucky.

customize.name: Fischl
customize.desc: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.

customize.name: Kaeya
customize.desc: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

customize.name: Varesa
customize.desc: A laid-back orchard manager and warrior of the Collective of Plenty. An aspiring hero who hungers for justice... and lots and lots of food!

customize.name: Iansan
customize.desc: Head coach of the fitness club at the Collective of Plenty, and a renowned Natlanese nutritionist.

customize.name: Traveler (Pyro)
customize.desc: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

customize.name: Kinich
customize.desc: A Huitztlan Saurian Hunter skilled at counting costs.

customize.name: Kachina
customize.desc: A young warrior of the Nanatzcayan, given the Ancient Name of "Uthabiti." Kind-hearted and insatiably persistent, she grows stronger and more capable with each setback she faces.

customize.name: Sigewinne
customize.desc: A Melusine and the Fortress of Meropide's head nurse. She cares equally for every convict locked in the undersea prison.

customize.name: Arlecchino
customize.desc: "The Knave," Fourth of the Fatui Harbingers. A poised, ruthless diplomat. To the children in the House of the Hearth, she is their feared yet dependable "Father."

customize.name: Xianyun
customize.desc: One of the Mighty and Illuminated Adepti of Jueyun, known as "Cloud Retainer." Expert in all kinds of mechanical contraptions, her heart now turns towards the affairs of the mortal world, through which she walks under the name "Xianyun."

customize.name: Neuvillette
customize.desc: The Chief Justice of Fontaine, known as the Iudex, is renowned for his unassailable impartiality.

customize.name: Lynette
customize.desc: A magic assistant of few words, her emotions are as inscrutable as any cat's.

customize.name: Mika
customize.desc: A young knight born to an ordinary family. He serves as a Front-Line Surveyor in his Company. He is a low-key and cautious character.

customize.name: Dehya
customize.desc: A member of the Eremites, a mercenary organization that roams the sands of Sumeru. Valiant and powerful, she enjoys great fame amongst her fellow Eremites.

customize.name: Alhaitham
customize.desc: The current scribe of the Sumeru Akademiya, a man endowed with extraordinary intelligence and talent. He lives free — free from the searching eyes of ordinary people, anyway.

customize.name: Nilou
customize.desc: The star of the Zubayr Theater. She is full of warmth and innocence, and her dances are lively and elegant.

customize.name: Yelan
customize.desc: A mysterious person who claims to work for the Ministry of Civil Affairs, but is a "non-entity" on the Ministry of Civil Affairs' list.

customize.name: Arataki Itto
customize.desc: The first and greatest head of the Arataki Gang, famed throughout Inazuma City's Hanamizaka... Wait, what? You've never heard of them? Are you trying to be funny here?

customize.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
customize.desc: The Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island. All of the island's affairs are at this young lady's fingertips.

customize.name: Xiao
customize.desc: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha."

customize.name: Charlotte
customize.desc: Reporter of The Steambird

customize.name: Traveler (Hydro)
customize.desc: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

customize.name: Baizhu
customize.desc: The owner of Bubu Pharmacy, who is rarely seen without the white snake named Changsheng. His medicinal knowledge is encyclopedic, and his personal intrigues subtle.

customize.name: Kaveh
customize.desc: A renowned architect from Sumeru who perhaps cares a bit too much about too many things. He is an aesthete troubled by reality.

customize.name: Yaoyao
customize.desc: Streetward Rambler's youngest disciple. A gentle and caring "little adult."

customize.name: Faruzan
customize.desc: A researcher from "one hundred years ago." She enjoys self-identifying as everyone's senior, and has significant knowledge of ancient scripts and machines of all kinds.

customize.name: Cyno
customize.desc: The General Mahamatra in charge of supervising the researchers of the Akademiya. It is said that when he gets down to work, the General Mahamatra is even more efficient than the "Great Vayuvyastra" made by the Kshahrewar.

customize.name: Dori
customize.desc: An elusive merchant who has a fondness for glittering Mora.

customize.name: Traveler (Dendro)
customize.desc: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

customize.name: Kamisato Ayato
customize.desc: The young but highly accomplished head of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan. Cultured and polite, he is a man of many ways and means.

customize.name: Shenhe
customize.desc: An adepti disciple with a most unusual air about her. Having spent much time cultivating in isolation in Liyue's mountains, she has become every bit as cool and distant as the adepti themselves.

customize.name: Gorou
customize.desc: The great general of Watatsumi Island's forces. He is deeply trusted by his subordinates.

customize.name: Thoma
customize.desc: The Kamisato Clan's housekeeper. A well-known "fixer" in Inazuma.

customize.name: Kujou Sara
customize.desc: A general of the Tenryou Commission. Bold, decisive, and skilled in battle.

customize.name: Sayu
customize.desc: A pint-sized ninja attached to the Shuumatsuban, who always seems sleep-deprived.

customize.name: Kamisato Ayaka
customize.desc: Daughter of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan. Dignified and elegant, as well as wise and strong.

customize.name: Traveler (Electro)
customize.desc: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

customize.name: Eula
customize.desc: The Spindrift Knight, a scion of the old aristocracy, and the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company. The reason for which a descendant of the ancient nobles might join the Knights remains a great mystery in Mondstadt to this very day.

customize.name: Yanfei
customize.desc: A well-known legal adviser active in Liyue Harbor. A brilliant young lady in whose veins runs the blood of an illuminated beast.

customize.name: Diona
customize.desc: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

customize.name: Jean
customize.desc: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius.

customize.name: Qiqi
customize.desc: An apprentice and herb gatherer at Bubu Pharmacy. An undead with a bone-white complexion, she seldom has much in the way of words or emotion.

customize.name: Sucrose
customize.desc: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

customize.name: Xingqiu
customize.desc: A young man carrying a longsword who is frequently seen at book booths. He has a chivalrous heart and yearns for justice and fairness for all.

customize.name: Beidou
customize.desc: Captain of her crew, The Crux. She's quite an unbound and forthright woman.

customize.name: Xiangling
customize.desc: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

customize.name: Razor
customize.desc: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.

customize.name: Barbara
customize.desc: Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. She learned the word "idol" from a magazine.

customize.name: Lisa
customize.desc: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Akademiya to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

customize.name: Yae Miko
customize.desc: Lady Guuji of the Grand Narukami Shrine. Also serves as the editor-in-chief of Yae Publishing House. Unimaginable intelligence and cunning are hidden under her beautiful appearance.

customize.name: Raiden Shogun
customize.desc: Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, who promised the people of Inazuma an unchanging Eternity.

customize.name: Mavuika
customize.desc: The leader of Natlan who inherited the Ancient Name of "Kiongozi." She made a vow to illuminate the future of the nation of war with the Sacred Flame.

customize.text: is currently the only character whose Elemental Burst is not reliant on Energy, but instead, on "Fighting Spirit."

There are two ways to obtain Elemental Energy: through particles and orbs, or as direct energy.
The particles generate a baseline of 1 point of Elemental Energy; Orbs a baseline of 3. Particles can be of one of the 7 elements or can be of clear color. Within the first category, an elemental particle can be of the same element as a character, or of a different one. Also, the character can be on-field or off-field when the particles are caught. These different combinations result in varying energy gained based on the situation, represented in the table below.
As an example: If the element of the particle/orb and character are identical, the amount of energy gained will be 300% of its base; for a clear one, 200%; and if their elements differ, 100%. If the character is on-field, they receive the full 100%; if not, just 60% (or 70% or 80% if there are only 3 or 2 members in the party respectively).

<color=#ffffff>On-field character</color>
<color=#ffffff>Off-field character</color>
<color=#ffffff>Particle /</color> <color=#ffffff>Orb</color>
<color=#ffffff>with a different element</color>
1 pt / 3 pts
0.6 pts / 1.8 pts
<color=#ffffff>Clear particle /</color> <color=#ffffff>orb</color>
2 pts / 6 pts
1.2 pts / 3.6 pts
<color=#ffffff>Particle /</color> <color=#ffffff>Orb</color>
<color=#ffffff>with the same element</color>
3 pts / 9 pts
1.8 pts / 5.4 pts

In this way, if a clear particle regenerates 2pts of Elemental Energy to the on-field character, with 200% Energy Recharge it will regenerate 4 points (2 x 100% x 200%); and with 150% Energy recharge, 3 points (2 x 100% x 150%).
There are many ways to generate particles: Elemental Skills, the Favonius weapons series passive, the Electro Elemental Resonance: High Voltage, and Enemy drops.

customize.name: Amber
customize.desc: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

customize.name: Kaeya
customize.desc: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

customize.text:
<color=#99ffff>Cryo</color>
<color=#ffffff73>2.67 (4th ascension passive: one or two additional particles when one or two enemies are frozen by Kaeya)</color>

customize.desc: An elusive merchant who has a fondness for glittering Mora.

customize.name: Candace
customize.desc: A descendant of King Deshret with an amber left eye. The defender of Aaru Village.

customize.name: Cyno
customize.desc: The General Mahamatra in charge of supervising the researchers of the Akademiya. It is said that when he gets down to work, the General Mahamatra is even more efficient than the "Great Vayuvyastra" made by the Kshahrewar.

customize.text:
<color=#ffacff>Electro</color>
<color=#ffffff73>3 (normal skill hit)</color>
<color=#ffffff73>1.33 (Mortuary Rite hit, during Ultimate Skill’s state)</color>

customize.name: Nilou
customize.desc: The star of the Zubayr Theater. She is full of warmth and innocence, and her dances are lively and elegant.

customize.name: Nahida
customize.desc: A caged bird secluded within the confines of the Sanctuary of Surasthana who can only see the world in her dreams.

customize.name: Layla
customize.desc: A Rtawahist student who specializes in Theoretical Astrology. Heavily prone to somnambulism and locked in a grinding war with sleep deprivation, the problem of restful slumber is a most troubling one to her.

customize.name: Faruzan
customize.desc: A researcher from "one hundred years ago." She enjoys self-identifying as everyone's senior, and has significant knowledge of ancient scripts and machines of all kinds.

customize.name: Wanderer
customize.desc: A wayfaring figure whose identity is a mystery. He dresses like a mountain ascetic, but he certainly does not act the part.

customize.text:
<color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color>
<color=#ffffff73>1 (on Normal Attack or Charged Attack during Elemental Skill state; CD 2s)</color>

customize.name: Yaoyao
customize.desc: Streetward Rambler's youngest disciple. A gentle and caring "little adult."

customize.name: Alhaitham
customize.desc: The current scribe of the Sumeru Akademiya, a man endowed with extraordinary intelligence and talent. He lives free — free from the searching eyes of ordinary people, anyway.

customize.name: Dehya
customize.desc: A member of the Eremites, a mercenary organization that roams the sands of Sumeru. Valiant and powerful, she enjoys great fame amongst her fellow Eremites.

customize.name: Mika
customize.desc: A young knight born to an ordinary family. He serves as a Front-Line Surveyor in his Company. He is a low-key and cautious character.

customize.name: Kaveh
customize.desc: A renowned architect from Sumeru who perhaps cares a bit too much about too many things. He is an aesthete troubled by reality.

customize.name: Baizhu
customize.desc: The owner of Bubu Pharmacy, who is rarely seen without the white snake named Changsheng. His medicinal knowledge is encyclopedic, and his personal intrigues subtle.

customize.name: Kirara
customize.desc: A courier for Komaniya Express, a delivery company in Inazuma. A nekomata who loves her job and human society.

customize.text:
<color=#99ff88>Dendro</color>
<color=#ffffff73>3 (on Flipclaw Strike)</color>
<color=#ffffff73>1 (on Urgent Neko Parcel hit; CD 4s)</color>

customize.name: Traveler (Hydro)
customize.desc: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

customize.name: Lynette
customize.desc: A magic assistant of few words, her emotions are as inscrutable as any cat's.

customize.name: Lyney
customize.desc: A famed Fontainian magician who possesses great stage presence as well as gift of the gab. Audiences are enthralled by his exquisite skills, and they hang on to his every clever word.

customize.name: Freminet
customize.desc: A reserved young man who is well-versed in diving. Beneath his distant, icy demeanor lies a pure heart bereft of all flaws.

customize.text:
<color=#99ffff>Cryo</color>
<color=#ffffff73>2 (using Upward Thrust on normal state)</color>
<color=#ffffff73>1 (using Upward Thrust on Burst state)</color>
<color=#ffffff73>1 (on Shattering Pressure: Level 4)</color>

customize.name: Neuvillette
customize.desc: The Chief Justice of Fontaine, known as the Iudex, is renowned for his unassailable impartiality.

customize.name: Wriothesley
customize.desc: Duke of the Fortress of Meropide, Lord Incognito of the murky depths.

customize.text:
<color=#99ffff>Cryo</color>
<color=#ffffff73>1 (on Normal Attack during Elemental Skill while above 50% HP, or on Enhanced Charged Attack; CD 2s)</color>

customize.name: Charlotte
customize.desc: Reporter of The Steambird

customize.name: Furina
customize.desc: The absolute focus of the stage of judgment, until the final applause sounds.

customize.name: Navia
customize.desc: The current President of Spina di Rosula, who is lovely, dutiful, and a great boss.

customize.name: Chevreuse
customize.desc: The captain of the Special Security and Surveillance Patrol, who wears justice as an ever-present seal upon her heart. Her musket shall only ever point at the guilty.

customize.name: Gaming
customize.desc: Guard of the Sword and Strongbox Secure Transport Agency, and the head of the "Mighty Mythical Beasts" Wushou troupe.

customize.name: Xianyun
customize.desc: One of the Mighty and Illuminated Adepti of Jueyun, known as "Cloud Retainer." Expert in all kinds of mechanical contraptions, her heart now turns towards the affairs of the mortal world, through which she walks under the name "Xianyun."

customize.name: Chiori
customize.desc: The owner of Chioriya Boutique. A tailor renowned throughout Fontaine.

customize.name: Arlecchino
customize.desc: "The Knave," Fourth of the Fatui Harbingers. A poised, ruthless diplomat. To the children in the House of the Hearth, she is their feared yet dependable "Father."

customize.name: Sethos
customize.desc: The Temple of Silence's heir. Burdened with secrets, he comes from the sands.

customize.name: Clorinde
customize.desc: An undefeated Champion Duelist. Sword in hand, she defends justice in the Court of Fontaine.

customize.text:
<color=#ffacff>Electro</color>
1 (on Swift Hunt or Impale the Night hit; CD 2s)

customize.name: Sigewinne
customize.desc: A Melusine and the Fortress of Meropide's head nurse. She cares equally for every convict locked in the undersea prison.

customize.name: Emilie
customize.desc: A Fontainian perfumer, one who bottles secrets.

customize.name: Kachina
customize.desc: A young warrior of the Nanatzcayan, given the Ancient Name of "Uthabiti." Kind-hearted and insatiably persistent, she grows stronger and more capable with each setback she faces.

customize.name: Mualani
customize.desc: A well-known guide in Natlan who owns a watersports shop, and expert in all forms of wave-chasing.

customize.name: Kinich
customize.desc: A Huitztlan Saurian Hunter skilled at counting costs.

customize.name: Xilonen
customize.desc: A Name Engraver of the Nanatzcayan, she is especially skilled at finding a good balance between the heavy responsibilities of her job and living well.

customize.name: Ororon
customize.desc: A young man from the Masters of the Night-Wind who instead lives in the wild alongside all manner of life.

customize.name: Chasca
customize.desc: The Peacemaker of the Tlalocan, the ender of all disputes.

customize.text:
<color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color>
<color=#ffffff73>5 (on first Shadowhunt Shell hit per skill)</color>

customize.name: Traveler (Pyro)
customize.desc: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

customize.text:
<color=#ff9999>Pyro</color>
1 (on Blazing Threshold or Scorching Threshold hit; CD 2.9s)

customize.name: Mavuika
customize.desc: The leader of Natlan who inherited the Ancient Name of "Kiongozi." She made a vow to illuminate the future of the nation of war with the Sacred Flame.

customize.name: Citlali
customize.desc: The great shaman from the Masters of the Night-Wind, the universally-revered Granny Itztli.

customize.name: Lan Yan
customize.desc: A rattan weaver from Chenyu Vale. Clear-minded and well-tempered, she is as lively as a mountain spring.

customize.name: Yumemizuki Mizuki
customize.desc: A shareholder of Aisa Bathhouse, a baku, and a clinical psychologist. Dedicated to the dispersal of nightmares, and to bringing people peace of mind.

customize.text:
<color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color>
<color=#ffffff73>1 (on each hits of her Skill; max.4)</color>

customize.name: Varesa
customize.desc: A laid-back orchard manager and warrior of the Collective of Plenty. An aspiring hero who hungers for justice... and lots and lots of food!

customize.name: Iansan
customize.desc: Head coach of the fitness club at the Collective of Plenty, and a renowned Natlanese nutritionist.

customize.text: The Favonius weapon-series generates 3 clear particles when the conditions are met: the weapon holder must be on-field when dealing a critical hit (with an additional probability and a Internal Cooldown, both of them depending on the weapon refinement).

customize.name: Favonius Codex
customize.desc: A secret tome that belonged to the scholars of the Knights of Favonius. It describes the logic and power of elements and matter.

customize.name: Favonius Greatsword
customize.desc: A heavy ceremonial sword of the Knights of Favonius. It channels elemental power easily and is highly destructive.

customize.name: Favonius Lance
customize.desc: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.

customize.name: Favonius Sword
customize.desc: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!

customize.name: Favonius Warbow
customize.desc: A standard-issue recurve bow of the Knights of Favonius. Only the best archers can unleash its full potential.

customize.text: Triggering an Electro-related Elemental Reaction will generate an Electro particle, with a Cooldown of 5 seconds (see more here:

customize.name: Elemental Resonance
customize.desc: Elemental Resonance provides additional effects that correspond to the elements present in the party.

customize.text:
All enemies drop a particle/orb when defeated and usually an elemental one according to the enemy element. Some enemies drop particles when reaching a fixed amount of HP lost. Slimes - drops an elemental particle when they lose 40% of their Max HP. Instead, the smaller fungus do not drop any other particle but the last one after being defeated.
Excluding weekly bosses, this mechanism is fixed for each enemy. Some enemies drop energy particles when reaching 25%, 50% and 75% of their Max HP, one particle each time (like Abyss Mages and Primal Constructs), others an orb (like Ruin Guards), others three orbs (like Lawachurls).

Any form of direct energy gained will not be affected by the Energy Recharge attribute for the receiving character. In some cases, the restored value may directly be dependent from a characters ER% stat, however, the ER% stat is only relevant when energy is gained as elemental orbs/particles.

Every Normal Attack and Charged Attack that hits an enemy has a probability to generate 1 Energy point, and if it fails, this probability becomes higher for the next hit. When generated, the probability returns to its ba <color=#ffffff73>se.</color>

There are some abilities (talents and constellations) that can generate Energy directly. For example, the Electro Traveler Elemental Skill and Burst, and their Constellation 4th and 6th.
The bonus of some artifacts' sets have the same effect:

<color=#ffffff>4-Piece Set</color>
Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for all party members (excluding the wearer) every 2s for 6s.

<color=#ffffff>4-Piece Set</color>
Gaining Elemental Particles or Orbs gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped.

customize.name: Scroll of the Hero of Cinder City

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>2-Piece Set</color>
When a nearby party member triggers a Nightsoul Burst, the equipping character regenerates 6 Energy.
Also, many weapons have this Energy generation effect:

customize.name: Prototype Amber
customize.desc: A dully gilded catalyst secretly guarded in the Blackcliff Forge. It seems to glow with the very light from the sky.

customize.text: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates <color=#37ffff>4/4.5/5/5.5/6</color> Energy every 2s for 6s.

customize.name: Amenoma Kageuchi
customize.desc: A blade custom made for a famed samurai who could strike down a tengu warrior, known for their incredible agility, in midair.

customize.text: After casting an Elemental Skill, gain 1 Succession Seed. This effect can be triggered once every 5s. The Succession Seed lasts for 30s. Up to 3 Succession Seeds may exist simultaneously. After using an Elemental Burst, all Succession Seeds are consumed and after 2s, the character regenerates <color=#37ffff>6/7.5/9/10.5/12</color> Energy for each seed consumed.

customize.name: Kitain Cross Spear
customize.desc: A special lance that was once used by a famed warrior who guarded the Tatarigami on Yashiori Island.

customize.text: After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates <color=#37ffff>3/3.5/4/4.5/5</color> Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

customize.name: Katsuragikiri Nagamasa
customize.desc: A blade that was once made in Tatarasuna. Heavy and tough.

customize.text: After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates <color=#37ffff>3/3.5/4/4.5/5</color> Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

customize.name: Everlasting Moonglow
customize.desc: A string of lovely jasper from the deep sea. It shines with a pure radiance like that of the moon, and just as ever-distant.

customize.text: For 12s after using an Elemental Burst, Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.6 Energy. Energy can be restored this way once every 0.1s.

customize.name: Jadefall's Splendor
customize.desc: A ritual vessel carved from jade that reflects the luster of the skies and the clear waters.

customize.text: For 3s after using an Elemental Burst or creating a shield, the equipping character can gain the Primordial Jade Regalia effect: Restore <color=#37ffff>4.5/5/5.5/6/6.5</color> Energy every 2.5s.

customize.name: Rightful Reward
customize.desc: A sharp spear. Only its tip remains freshly bloodstained.

customize.text: When the wielder is healed, restore <color=#37ffff>8/10/12/14/16</color> Energy. This effect can be triggered once every 10s, and can occur even when the character is not on the field.

customize.name: Tome of the Eternal Flow
customize.desc: A manual that was once passed down from generation to generation within an underwater priory. Today, none know of its existence.

customize.text: When current HP increases or decreases, Charged Attack DMG will be increased by <color=#37ffff>14%/18%/22%/26%/30%</color> for 4s. Max 3 stacks. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s. When the character has 3 stacks or a third stack's duration refreshes, <color=#37ffff>8/9/10/11/12</color> Energy will be restored. This Energy restoration effect can be triggered once every 12s.

customize.name: The Dockhand's Assistant
customize.desc: A convenient cutting tool that you can rarely find nowadays. You can replace the blades as they are dulled by usage.

customize.text: When the wielder is healed or heals others, they will gain a Stoic's Symbol that lasts 30s, up to a maximum of 3 Symbols. When using their Elemental Skill or Burst, all Symbols will be consumed and the Roused effect will be granted for 10s. 2s after the effect occurs, for each Symbol consumed <color=#37ffff>2/2.5/3/3.5/4</color> Energy will be restored for said character. The Roused effect can be triggered once every 15s, and Symbols can be gained even when the character is not on the field.

customize.name: Crane's Echoing Call
customize.desc: A fan carved from pure jade, around which swirls an ancient aura of adeptal energy.

customize.text: When nearby party members hit opponents with Plunging Attacks, they will restore <color=#37ffff>2.5/2.75/3/3.25/3.5</color> Energy to the equipping character. Energy can be restored this way every 0.7s.

customize.name: Dialogues of the Desert Sages
customize.desc: A caduceus symbolizing the glory of alchemy, made from special alloys to match its special status. It is exceedingly rigid and heavy, and would probably hurt pretty bad if used as a cudgel.

customize.text: When the wielder performs healing, restore <color=#37ffff>8/10/12/14/16</color> Energy. This effect can be triggered once every 10s and can occur even when the character is not on the field.

customize.name: Lumidouce Elegy
customize.desc: A magnificent polearm adorned with azure crystal. It is said to have been a certain legendary Champion Duelist's treasure — and yet, not once was it ever used.

customize.text: After the equipping character triggers Burning on an opponent or deals Dendro DMG to Burning opponents, the DMG dealt is increased by <color=#37ffff>18%/23%/28%/33%/38%</color> . This effect lasts for 8s, max 2 stacks. When 2 stacks are reached or when the duration is refreshed at 2 stacks, restore <color=#37ffff>12/13/14/15/16</color> Energy. Energy can be restored this way once every 12s. The 2 aforementioned effects can be triggered even when the character is off-field.

Activating the Elemental Burst or being defeated isn’t the only way in which the Energy is consumed or lost. There are some weapons, artifacts and enemies with this ability; and even some domains or challenges have it too.

<color=#ffffff>4-Piece Set</color>
When casting an Elemental Skill, if the character has 15 or more Energy, they lose 15 Energy and Normal/Charged/Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 50% for 10s. This effect will not trigger again during that duration.

customize.name: Katsuragikiri Nagamasa
customize.desc: A blade that was once made in Tatarasuna. Heavy and tough.

customize.text: After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates <color=#37ffff>3/3.5/4/4.5/5</color> Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

customize.name: Kitain Cross Spear
customize.desc: A special lance that was once used by a famed warrior who guarded the Tatarigami on Yashiori Island.

customize.text: After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates <color=#37ffff>3/3.5/4/4.5/5</color> Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

customize.name: Sethos
customize.desc: The Temple of Silence's heir. Burdened with secrets, he comes from the sands.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>1st Ascension passive</color>
When Aiming, the charging time is decreased by 0.285s based on each point of Sethos's current Elemental Energy. Charging time can be reduced to a minimum of 0.3s through this method and a maximum of 20 Energy can be tallied. If a <color=#ffd780>Shadowpiercing Shot</color> is fired, consume the tallied amount of Elemental Energy; if it is a Charge Level 1 shot, then consume 50% of the tallied amount of Elemental Energy.

customize.name: Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning
customize.desc:
A monster who serves the Abyss Order and commands lightning while singing the praises of the darkness.
These are the evangelists and the scholars of the Abyss. Their violent lightning strikes the hearts of unbelievers with dark wisdom, warped by the shadowy depths of an eternal night, its violet glow proclaiming the existence of a great power that corrodes human intellect.

customize.text: It possesses some ability to disrupt elemental powers, and some of its attacks will <color=#ffe14b>drain characters' Elemental Energy</color> when dealing DMG to them.

customize.name: Magatsu Mitake Narukami no Mikoto
customize.desc:
This is the form that the puppet that inherited the Raiden Shogun's authority takes when she is opposing those who threaten Eternity.
As the Raiden Shogun's assistant in pursuing eternity, she has never doubted, never felt fear, never given anything less than her best, never been disturbed by idle thoughts.
She once heard about how Ei had shouldered a similar duty when Makoto was also present, suffering much agonizing loss in the process.
When the two shadows overlapped once more, however, she could only see the countless fine fractures in what should have been "her" eternal will. Since fate is destined for cyclicality, she must fulfill her promise and declare war on "her."

Mine is the most supreme and noble form. Power over the realm has been vested within me, and I am the essence of all that is the "Raiden Shogun."
"Naturally, I have also inherited the pain of Ei's countless losses and her will to attain Eternity.
"Resolve, valor, love, hate... They will all twist in the river of time.
"But the 'rules' will never change."

customize.text: While Magatsu Mitake Narukami no Mikoto is in the Baleful Shadowlord form, <color=#ffe14b>active characters will lose Elemental Energy</color> at intervals.

customize.name: Bathysmal Vishap Herd
customize.desc:
A powerful group of Bathysmal Vishaps.

They have been specifically bred and selected by the people of Enkanomiya, which has given them their exceptional strength. Of course, no vishap would consider this some sort of debt to be repaid.

The strongest members of this herd can use different elements, which they wield as a show of their hatred.

customize.name: Bolteater Bathysmal Vishap
customize.desc:
A vishap that dwells deep beneath the oceans. Due to certain social adaptations, it has manifested a form aligned with the Electro element.
Following the fading of the Seven Sovereigns' power, a new generation of Sovereigns is presently being born. But now that the Bathysmal Vishaps have evolved in this manner, they have lost their purity. As such, the Dragon of Water will no longer be born from among their ranks. Prophecy holds that the new Dragon of Water will definitely descend in the form of a human.

customize.name: Primordial Bathysmal Vishap
customize.desc:
A vishap that dwells deep beneath the oceans.
They were once the dominant race in the depths — and indeed, dragons were the overlords of the whole world in an even earlier age. But their former Seven Sovereigns were defeated by a power from the heavens, withering one by one.

customize.text: When it faces strong foes, it will use its powerful Cleansing Shower. Characters hit by this attack will <color=#ffe14b>lose a certain amount of Elemental Energy</color> . If they do not have sufficient Elemental Energy, they will <color=#ffe14b>lose HP</color> .

customize.name: Shouki no Kami, the Prodigal
customize.desc:
Shouki no Kami, as an artificial divinity created using all the might of Sumeru's Six Darshans, has power that rivals that of true gods.
But those of this world who call such a being a "false deity" misunderstand the true meaning of the word.
Shouki no Kami now understands countless things and shoulders unassailable might, and may be said to surpass mortals.
If gods must love mortals, then Shouki no Kami, who grants failure in equal measure to humanity loves them also.
If gods must watch over humanity,
...
...
Then Shouki no Kami who has borne witness to infinite love, hatred, partings, grudges, and maddening anger - thus does he watch over mortals.

"Too much happiness you have had!"
"It has made you foolish. Arrogant. Horrifying in your greed."
"Let this era end!"
"Let the new god announce the defeat of the old."
"Foolish mortal... There is yet time for you to kneel."

customize.text: When Shouki no Kami's Setsuna Shoumetsu is descending and characters are immobilized, all party members will have their energy fully drained.

customize.name: Rock-Cavernous Wayob Manifestation
customize.desc:
The Children of Echoes believe in and worship the Wayob, which manifests upon the land with the power of totems and Nightsouls.
The people of Natlan believe that the Wayob dwell in the kingdom of the Lord of the Night, and have no fixed form, instead attaching themselves to anything in order to provide guidance to lost tribespeople. Wayob manifestations are particularly special, and the figure revealed through the totems often has an important purpose.
The Children of Echoes believe that their Wayob has the power to shape mountains and valleys, and can control the echoes created when rock meets stone.

customize.name: Foliar-Swift Wayob Manifestation
customize.desc:
The Scions of the Canopy believe in and worship the Wayob, which manifests upon the land with the power of totems and Nightsouls.
In the stories of the storytellers, Wayob manifestations often appear as the messengers of trials, or guides to the kingdom of the Lord of the Night. A Saurian-Crowned Warrior once said that he fought with a Wayob in a trance while practicing his skills, and in doing so, gained deeper understanding.
The Scions of the Canopy believe their Wayob has the power to control the growth of fruits and leaves, and can also control the roots of crops and draw the patterns of the veins of leaves.

customize.name: Flow-Inverted Wayob Manifestation
customize.desc:
The People of the Springs believe in and worship the Wayob, which manifests upon the land with the power of totems and Nightsouls.
The so-called "Wayob" is the belief that gradually formed primarily from the tribes and obsidian totems after the people of Natlan began communicating with the kingdom of the Lord of the Night. A "Wayob" is a consciousness of collective thought, and the home of the ancestors' souls.
The People of the Springs believe their Wayob has the power to control the tides and waves, and can control the changes of flowing and still, dead waters alike.

customize.name: Burning-Aflame Wayob Manifestation
customize.desc:
The Flower-Feather Clan believe in and worship the Wayob, which manifests upon the land with the power of totems and Nightsouls.
They say that long ago, Wayob Manifestations looked very different from how they do today, taking on a rougher form that was more akin to that of an obsidian statue. But once their outline had been recorded in woven scrolls, there have been few changes in their appearance since.
The people of the Flower-Feather Clan believe their Wayob has the power to control fire and burning flames, and can also control the flow of heat and blazing winds.

customize.name: Biting-Cold Wayob Manifestation
customize.desc:
The Masters of the Night-Wind believe in and worship the Wayob, which manifests upon the land with the power of totems and Nightsouls.
The Masters of the Night-Wind have tried using many mediums to communicate with the Night Kingdom. Eventually, they discovered that the medium that allowed them to establish the most stable connection with the Wayob was obsidian. This may explain why, over the ages, Wayob Manifestations have taken on a form that resembles a stone statue. The Masters of the Night-Wind believe their Wayob has the power to control the process of freezing and crystallization, and can also command both fixedness and mutability.

customize.name: Thundering Wayob Manifestation
customize.desc:
The Collective of Plenty believe in and worship the Wayob, which manifests upon the land with the power of totems and Nightsouls.
According to tribal legend, the Wayob has taken on countless forms. In the dim, pre-dawn darkness, where faces were hidden in shadows, the Wayob would wrestle with the mightiest tribal warriors, with neither side prevailing. The Collective of Plenty believe their Wayob has the power to control thunder and speed, and can bestow abundant harvests upon the land.

customize.text: In battle, the Wayob Manifestation will deploy its Arena: Moment of Trial, creating a shield for itself and absorbing the Elemental Energy of all characters in the Arena.

value.name: Energy Recharge
value.desc: Energy Recharge (ER%) is a percentage statistic that determines how much Energy a character regains by receiving the same amount of particles.

galleryCharacter.key: Energy needed by an Elemental Burst

imgDesc.text: You can check here the fixed amount of Energy your characater's Elemental Burst needs.
Some enemies can drain the Elemental Energy of your characters.
